## `SetExcludedTextHighlightColor`

Sets the font color for excluded text in formatted reports.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetExcludedTextHighlightColor(string colorName)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|`string` colorName | The name of the color to use. |
